# sourceType

**Instance Property**

The type of this source object.

## Declaration

```swift
var sourceType: EKSourceType { get }
```

## Discussion

Possible values are described in [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKSourceType].

## Accessing Source Properties

- **EKSourceType**: The type of source object.
- **sourceIdentifier**: A unique identifier for the source object.
- **title**: The name of this source object.
